metadata.description: Agent Skills for NeMo Evaluator SDK

plugins.name: nel-config-generator
plugins.description: Interactive config generator for NeMo Evaluator Launcher. Creates YAML configs for running model evaluations with support for SLURM and Local executors, all deployment types (vLLM, SGLang, NIM, TRT-LLM), and multiple exporters (MLflow, W&B, GSheets, Local).
